Description: REST API Gateway and Lambda functions for host profile submission (staging)

Properties.Description: Capture GuardDuty malware scan completion events for listing images

detail-type: GuardDuty Malware Protection Object Scan Result

Properties.Name: staging-guardduty-scan-complete

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when image processing queue has backlog > 10 min
Alert when images have been queued for > 30 min
Alert when failed images land in DLQ

Properties.Description: Process listing images: malware scanning + WebP conversion

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when image processor Lambda has errors
Alert when image processor Lambda is throttled

Properties.Description: Capture GuardDuty malware scan completion events for verification files

detail-type: GuardDuty Malware Protection Object Scan Result

Properties.Name: staging-guardduty-scan-complete-verification

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when verification processing queue has backlog > 10 min
Alert when failed verification files land in DLQ

Properties.Description: Process verification files: malware scanning + move to final destination

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when verification processor Lambda has errors
Alert when verification processor Lambda is throttled

Properties.Description: Consolidated: Host profile operations (submit-intent, confirm-submission, update-rejected, get-profile)
Retrieve host subscription details and entitlements
Consolidated: Host listings operations (get-metadata, submit-intent, confirm-submission, list, get, delete)
Consolidated: Host requests operations (list, get, submit-intent, confirm-submission, video, verification)
Admin: Consolidated handler for all host operations
Admin: Consolidated handler for all listing operations
Admin: Consolidated handler for all request operations
